entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
